logging

Class CSVLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • logging.CSVLog

  • public class CSVLog
extends java.lang.Object
    Decision object with unique information for each farm. This object can output a gams compatible simulation file, as well as output a log of all decisions and parameters during the model execution. This object contains a public 2d array of the pre/post sowing strategies that correspond to the 72 strategies in the model.
    Author:
    kellerke

              Farm farm)
        Constructor for the Decision Result
        Parameters:
        allActivities - full set of activities
        farmId: - ID of the farm
        possibleActivities: - full activity set
        year: - time period
        strat: - strategy
        currentActivity: - current activity(ies) in system
        income: - income of farm
        learning_rate: - learning rate for the agent
        farm: - specific farm for this decision object

    • Method Detail

      • appendLogFile

        public void appendLogFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        write output CSV log file based on decision object. This log file can be updated each time period for each agent.
        Parameters:
        fileName - of output file which is previously checked to ensure we will not exceed 1 million lines of data.
